com.totsp.gwittir.client.ui.calendar
Interface CalendarListener

public interface CalendarListener

A listener interface for click events on Calendars.

Author:
cooper

Method Summary
 boolean onDateClicked(Calendar calendar, java.util.Date date)
          Called when a date is clicked.
 

Method Detail

onDateClicked

boolean onDateClicked(Calendar calendar,
                      java.util.Date date)
Called when a date is clicked.

Parameters:
calendar - The calendar that fired the event
date - The date that was clicked on.
Returns:
A boolean indicating whether processing of events on this date should continue (true) or be halted (false).
